div.h3: Introduction à votre tableau de bord.

div.p:
Votre tableau de bord est une représentation visuelle des informations les plus importantes liées à vos procédures effectuées sur Rokhas.ma.
Cette représentation est un outil d'évaluation de votre travail, constitué de plusieurs indicateurs de performance à des moments donnés ou sur des périodes données.
Les indicateurs ont pour but de mesurer votre performance, d'avoir une vision globale sur votre écosystème (Administration) et de vous aider à prendre les décisions relatives aux objectifs et résultats.

{"select":[{"_item":"d.maitre_o_name","_as":"allMaitresOuvrages"},{"_item":"SUM(d.cc)","_as":"instanceNbr","_fact":true}],"roots":{"from":{"_as":"d","__text":"Fact_dossier"},"join":[{"_as":"com","_outer":"left","__text":"d.commission"},{"_as":"jc","_outer":"left","__text":"d.jour_commission"},{"_as":"loc","_outer":"left","__text":"d.lieu"}]},"clause":{"criter":[{"operand":"d.reference","operator":"like","value":"query.reference","_optional":"true"},{"operand":"d.tf","operator":"like","value":"query.refFoncierIndexe","_optional":"true"},{"operand":"d.architect_desc","operator":"like","value":"query.architecte.description","_optional":"true"},{"operand":"d.type_desc","operator":"like","value":"query.type","_optional":"true"},{"operand":"d.nature_desc","operator":"like","value":"query.nature","_optional":"true"},{"operand":"d.statut_desc","operator":"=","value":"query.statut","_optional":"true"},{"operand":"d.dateDepot","operator":">=","value":"query.dateDepot.min","_optional":"true","_indexType":"date"},{"operand":"d.dateDepot","operator":"<=","value":"query.dateDepot.max","_optional":"true","_indexType":"date"},{"operand":"d.datepaiementtaxe","operator":">=","value":"query.datepaiementtaxe.min","_optional":"true","_indexType":"date"},{"operand":"d.datepaiementtaxe","operator":"<=","value":"query.datepaiementtaxe.max","_optional":"true","_indexType":"date"},{"operand":"d.creation_time","operator":">=","value":"query.creation_time.min","_optional":"true","_indexType":"date"},{"operand":"d.creation_time","operator":"<=","value":"query.creation_time.max","_optional":"true","_indexType":"date"},{"operand":"d.dateDecisionPresident","operator":">=","value":"query.dateDecisionPresident.min","_optional":"true","_indexType":"date"},{"operand":"d.dateDecisionPresident","operator":"<=","value":"query.dateDecisionPresident.max","_optional":"true","_indexType":"date"},{"operand":"d.datePremierDepot","operator":">=","value":"query.dateedepot.min","_optional":"true","_indexType":"date"},{"operand":"d.datePremierDepot","operator":"<=","value":"query.dateedepot.max","_optional":"true","_indexType":"date"},{"operand":"arch.login","operator":"=","value":"query.currentUser","_optional":"true"},{"operand":"d.maitre_o_name","operator":"like","value":"query.allMaitresOuvrages","_optional":"true"},{"operand":"d.activite_desc","operator":"=","value":"query.currentActivity","_optional":"true"},{"operand":"d.dateCommission","operator":">=","value":"query.datecommission.min","_optional":"true","_indexType":"date"},{"operand":"d.dateCommission","operator":"<=","value":"query.datecommission.max","_optional":"true","_indexType":"date"},{"operand":"d.categorie_desc","operator":"=","value":"query.categorieProjet","_optional":"true"},{"operand":"jc.retard","operator":">","value":"query.retard.min","_optional":"true","_indexType":"double"},{"operand":"d.duree_delivrance","operator":">","value":"query.duree_delivrance.min","_optional":"true","_indexType":"double"},{"operand":"loc.prefecture","operator":"like","value":"query.prefecture","_optional":"true"},{"operand":"loc.arrondissement","operator":"like","value":"query.arrondissement","_optional":"true"},{"value":" allMaitresOuvrages in (\"AFRIQUE ÉDUCATION DÉVELOPPEMENT SARL\", \"AFRIQUE ÉDUCATION SA\", \"AGENCE D URBANISATION ET DE DEVELOPPEMENT D ANFA *A.U.D.A* S.A\", \"BENAMOUR ABDELAZIZ\", \"EL BOUSTANI SANAE\", \"ELBILIA LÉON L AFRICAIN S.A.R.L\", \"GROUPE ELBILIA PRIVEE S.A.R.L\", \"LA SOCIÉTÉ ALÉXENDRIE\", \"LAZRAK ALI\", \"LEON L AFRICAIN GROUPE ELBILIA S.A.R.L\", \"OFFICE NATIONAL DE L EAU POTABLE\", \"PERSONNE MORALE\", \"SOCIÉTÉ D AMÉNAGEMENT ZENATA \", \"SOCIETE DOUNIA ZAD SARL\", \"SOCIÉTÉ GESTION DÉLÉGUÉE GROUPE ELBILIA PRIVE SARLAU\", \"SOCIETE GROUPE SCOLAIRE ELBILIA D ANFA S.A.R.L\", \"SOCIETE LEON L AFRICAIN GROUPE ELBILIA S.A.R.L\", \"SOCIÉTÉ MIDP HOTEL \", \"SOCIÉTÉ NATIONALE D AMÉNAGEMENT COMMUNAL \", \"SOCIÉTÉ NATIONALE D’AMÉNAGEMENT COMMUNAL « SONADAC SA »\",
